text.text: Assign a valid reference to the suppressed emails, domains or IPs while putting them in the suppression list to remember they were suppressed in the first place.
Remove suppressed emails associated with a reference

Delete the reference when there remains no need of suppressing the emails associated with a reference. This function removes all the email addresses associated with the specific reference once it is deleted.
Flush all the domains within a reference

Delete all the domains that are associated to a single reference by flushing that particular reference. “Flush Reference” function removes all the domains from suppression associated with a particular reference.
